languages.text: Цель выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −40. В случае провала кровопускатель наносит <u>(от 12 до 30)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}психического урона{/g} всем в конусе (5 клеток) перед целью и накладывает {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечение{/g} (8) на 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}. При успешном прохождении проверки цель получает <u>(от 3 до 18)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}психического урона{/g}.
languages.original_text: If the targets fail a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −40 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}, the Bloodletter deals <u>(from 12 to 30)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g} to everyone in a cone with a 5-cell range in front of it and inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (8) for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. If the targets successfully pass the test, they suffer <u>(from 3 to 18)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Кровопускатель наносит {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}психический урон{/g} всем вокруг. Цели выполняют проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае провала получают эффект {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g} на 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}.

Кровопускатель наносит {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}психический урон{/g} всем вокруг. Цели выполняют проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае провала получают эффект {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g} на 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}.

If the targets successfully pass the test, they suffer <u>(from 3 to 18)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}.
languages.original_text: Цель выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −40. В случае провала кровопускатель наносит <u>(от 12 до 30)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}психического урона{/g} всем в конусе (5 клеток) перед целью и накладывает {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечение{/g} (8) на 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}. При успешном прохождении проверки цель получает <u>(от 3 до 18)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}психического урона{/g}.

traits.locale_text: If the targets fail a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −40 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}, the Bloodletter deals <u>(from 12 to 30)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g} to everyone in a cone with a 5-cell range in front of it and inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (8) for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. If the targets successfully pass the test, they suffer <u>(from 3 to 18)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}.

If the targets fail a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −40 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}, the Bloodletter deals <u>(from 12 to 30)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g} to everyone in a cone with a 5-cell range in front of it and inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (8) for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. If the targets successfully pass the test, they suffer <u>(from 3 to 18)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}.

If the targets fail a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −40 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}, the Bloodletter deals <u>(from 12 to 30)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g} to everyone in a cone with a 5-cell range in front of it and inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (8) for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. If the targets successfully pass the {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}, they suffer <u>(from 3 to 18)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}.

languages.text: 放血鬼攻击周围5格内所有生物，所有受影响的生物都需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受-40{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。未能通过检定的生物会受到<u>12-30</u>点{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神伤害{/g}，且受到{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}（8）效果影响，持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。通过检定的生物会受到<u>3-18</u>点{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神伤害{/g}。
languages.original_text: If the targets fail a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −40 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}, the Bloodletter deals <u>(from 12 to 30)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g} to everyone in a cone with a 5-cell range in front of it and inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (8) for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. If the targets successfully pass the test, they suffer <u>(from 3 to 18)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 放血鬼对周围所有生物造成{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神伤害{/g}，受影响的生物需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，未能通过检定的生物会{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。

放血鬼攻击周围5格内所有生物，所有受影响的生物都需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受-40{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。未能通过检定的生物会受到<u>12-30</u>点{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神伤害{/g}，且受到{g|Encyclopedia:Range}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}（8）效果影响，持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。通过{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}的生物会受到<u>3-18</u>点{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神伤害{/g}。

languages.text: ターゲットが-40の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受けた状態で{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に失敗した場合、ブラッドレターは<u>12～30</u>の{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神的ダメージ{/g}を、その正面5セルの扇形範囲内の全員に与え、2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}(8)を付与する。ターゲットが判定に成功した場合、与える{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神的ダメージ{/g}が<u>3～18</u>になる。
languages.original_text: If the targets fail a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −40 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}, the Bloodletter deals <u>(from 12 to 30)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g} to everyone in a cone with a 5-cell range in front of it and inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (8) for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. If the targets successfully pass the test, they suffer <u>(from 3 to 18)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: ブラッドレターは周辺にいる全員に2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神ダメージ{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}を与える。ターゲットが{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}抵抗{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に成功すれば避けることができる。

ターゲットが-40の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受けた状態で{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に失敗した場合、ブラッドレターは<u>12～30</u>の{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神的ダメージ{/g}を、その正面5セルの扇形{g|Encyclopedia:Range}範囲{/g}内の全員に与え、2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}(8)を付与する。ターゲットが{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に成功した場合、与える{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神的ダメージ{/g}が<u>3～18</u>になる。

languages.text: Si el objetivo falla una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −40, el Desangrador inflige <u>(de 12 a 30)</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}daño mental{/g} a todo el mundo en un cono con un alcance de 5 casillas delante de él e inflige {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g} (8) durante 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}. Si el objetivo supera la prueba, solo sufre <u>(de 3 a 18)</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}daño mental{/g}.
languages.original_text: If the targets fail a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −40 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}, the Bloodletter deals <u>(from 12 to 30)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g} to everyone in a cone with a 5-cell range in front of it and inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (8) for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. If the targets successfully pass the test, they suffer <u>(from 3 to 18)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: El Desangrador inflige {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}daño mental{/g} a todos los objetivos a su alrededor y {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g} durante 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g} a menos que el objetivo supere una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de resistencia de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g}.

languages.text: Der Zerfleischer fügt allen Kreaturen in einem kegelförmigen Bereich vor ihm mit einer Reichweite von 5 Feldern <u>12 bis 30</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}Mentalschaden{/g} zu und verursacht 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} lang {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g} (8), es sei denn, das Ziel besteht eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −40. Gelingt diese Probe, erleidet das Ziel <u>3 bis 18</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}Mentalschaden{/g}.
languages.original_text: If the targets fail a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −40 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}, the Bloodletter deals <u>(from 12 to 30)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g} to everyone in a cone with a 5-cell range in front of it and inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (8) for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. If the targets successfully pass the test, they suffer <u>(from 3 to 18)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Der Zerfleischer fügt allen in seiner Umgebung {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}Mentalschaden{/g} zu und verursacht 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} lang {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g}, es sei denn, das Ziel besteht eine {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}.

languages.text: Si la cible échoue à un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −40, le Sanguinaire inflige <u>(12 à 30)</u> points de {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}dégâts mentaux{/g} à tous les personnages présents dans un cône d'une portée de 5 cases devant lui, ainsi que l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} (8) pendant 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Si les cibles réussissent le test, elles subissent <u>(3 à 18)</u> points de {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}dégâts mentaux{/g}.
languages.original_text: If the targets fail a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −40 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}, the Bloodletter deals <u>(from 12 to 30)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g} to everyone in a cone with a 5-cell range in front of it and inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (8) for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. If the targets successfully pass the test, they suffer <u>(from 3 to 18)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Si la cible échoue à un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −40, le Sanguinaire inflige <u>(12 à 30)</u> points de {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}dégâts mentaux{/g} à tous les personnages présents dans un cône d'une portée de 5 cases devant lui, ainsi que l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} (8) pendant 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Si les cibles réussissent le {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}, elles subissent <u>(3 à 18)</u> points de {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}dégâts mentaux{/g}.

languages.text: Hedef, −40 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ceza puanına{/g} sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçemezse Kanakıtan, önündeki 5 hücrelik konik bir alandaki herkese <u>(12 ila 30)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}zihinsel hasar{/g} verir ve {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}kanama{/g} (8) etkisi oluşturur. Bu etki, 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer. Hedef, testi geçerse <u>(3 ila 18)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}zihinsel hasara{/g} maruz kalır.
languages.original_text: If the targets fail a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −40 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}, the Bloodletter deals <u>(from 12 to 30)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g} to everyone in a cone with a 5-cell range in front of it and inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (8) for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. If the targets successfully pass the test, they suffer <u>(from 3 to 18)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}.
